name: les-cv-2
description: The Digital Curriculum Vitae of Les Moffat Esq | A Universal PWA built using react, redux, express and next.js. Because, well, why not, I wanted to see if I could do it.

scripts.https:gen-dev-cert: cd ~/Sites/cv-v2/app/server/dev-https; openssl req -config lescv.dev.conf -new -sha256 -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -keyout lescv.dev.key -x509 -days 365 -out lescv.dev.crt
